GSD.description:
xprtrdma: fix pointer derefs in error cases of rpcrdma_ep_create

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.25 by commit 9921c866dc369577c3ebb9adf2383b01b58c18de. For more details please see the references link.
